brief: Johaug dominates 10km classic. Klaebo hunts fourth Olympic gold in men's sprint.
Liverpool chase title at Sunderland. Arsenal visit Brentford to keep pace.
Norway's golden week continues: Boe brothers, Roeiseland, and Kilde all medal hunting.

radar: Hovland tees off at Pebble Beach this Sunday, one of golf's most iconic venues on the California coast.
Ruud's next tournament appearance remains unconfirmed as the tennis season builds toward Indian Wells and Miami in March.
Carlsen likely preparing for Candidates Tournament qualifier events as the chess calendar enters its spring phase.
